scripts.build-prod: node-sass src/scss/base.scss dist/css/base.min.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/scss/components.scss dist/css/components.min.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/scss/piggyback.scss dist/css/piggyback.min.css --output-style compressed && postcss dist/css/*.css --replace --no-map --use autoprefixer && babel src --out-file dist/js/upds.min.js --ignore '**/*.test.js'
scripts.build-staging: node-sass src/scss -o dist/staging/css --output-style compressed && postcss dist/staging/css/*.css --replace --use autoprefixer && babel src --out-file dist/staging/js/upds.min.js --ignore '**/*.test.js'
scripts.watch: node-sass src/scss -o dist/staging/css --watch & babel src --watch --out-file dist/staging/js/upds.min.js --ignore '**/*.test.js'
